thread.title: Empire strikes back: EU to combat strongmen

title: Empire strikes back: EU to combat strongmen
text:
Empire strikes back: EU to combat strongmen 5:48am EDT - 01:58
The European Union will deploy a new financial weapon next week to try to rein in what Brussels sees as illiberal nationalism rising in the east of the bloc and threatening its democratic foundations. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The European Union will deploy a new financial weapon next week to try to rein in what Brussels sees as illiberal nationalism rising in the east of the bloc and threatening its democratic foundations.
